name: RiskAdjustmentHiearchiesAppliedStatusCodeSystem
title: Risk Adjustment Hiearchies Applied Status Code System
description: (The Da Vinci Risk Adjustment Implementation Guide is under development). This is a code system for Risk Adjustment hiearchies applied status to indicate whether hiearchies were applied to a Condition Category when it is applicable.

concept.definition: Hiearchies were applied to a Condition Catetory.
Hiearchies were not applied to a Condition Catetory.
Applying hiearchies to a Condition Category is not applicable.
